instructions: Open the App Store by tapping the icon. On the Today tab, tap your picture . Tap Purchased . If you're using Family Sharing, tap a name on the next screen to pull up the apps that Apple ID has purchased. Tap Not on this iPad to restrict the results to apps you don't already have installed. Scroll down, or use the search bar , to locate the app you want to install. Tap the Download button (it looks like a cloud) to install an app from the list.
